abstract: Richard Peacock, whose specialties are the consumer and retail industries, will serve as a managing director and be based in New York when he joins in October.
snippet: Richard Peacock, whose specialties are the consumer and retail industries, will serve as a managing director and be based in New York when he joins in October.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired a longtime deal specialist in the consumer and retail industries to join its mergers practice.

headline.main: Bank of America Merrill Lynch Hires a Deal Specialist From Goldman

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
